HediffDef.label: saw arm
HediffDef.description: An installed saw arm.

HediffDef.label: welder arm
HediffDef.description: An installed welder arm.

HediffDef.label: medi - hand
HediffDef.description: An installed medi - hand.

HediffDef.label: Royal eye
HediffDef.description: An installed royal eye.

HediffDef.label: aiming hand
HediffDef.description: An installed aiming hand.

HediffDef.label: trader's jaw
HediffDef.description: An installed trader's jaw

HediffDef.label: toolbox arm
HediffDef.description: An installed toolbox arm.

HediffDef.label: tamer's hand
HediffDef.description: An installed tamer's hand.

HediffDef.label: multi-tool arm
HediffDef.description: An installed multi-tool arm.

HediffDef.label: mining hand
HediffDef.description: An install mining hand.

HediffDef.label: computing arm
HediffDef.description: An installed computing arm.

HediffDef.label: chef hand
HediffDef.description: An installed chef hand.

HediffDef.label: chainsaw arm
HediffDef.description: An installed chainsaw arm.

HediffDef.label: archotech multi-tool arm
HediffDef.description: An installed archotech multi-tool arm.

HediffDef.label: vacuum arm
HediffDef.description: An installed vacuum arm.

HediffDef.label: vacuum hand
HediffDef.description: An installed vacuum hand.

HediffDef.label: mop leg
HediffDef.description: An installed mop leg.

HediffDef.label: mop foot
HediffDef.description: An installed mop foot.

HediffDef.label: anima carrier leg
HediffDef.description: An installed anima carrier leg.

HediffDef.label: anima clawer arm
HediffDef.description: An installed anima clawer arm.

HediffDef.label: anima gauranlen arm
HediffDef.description: An installed anima gauranlen arm.

HediffDef.label: anima horn
HediffDef.description: An installed anima anima horn.

HediffDef.label: anima nose
HediffDef.description: An installed anima nose.

HediffDef.label: anima jaw
HediffDef.description: An installed anima jaw.

HediffDef.label: anima ear
HediffDef.description: An installed anima ear.

HediffDef.label: Psychic dryad
HediffDef.description: An installed psychic dryad.

HediffDef.label: Mind dryad
HediffDef.description: An installed mind dryad.

HediffDef.label: anima barkskin
HediffDef.description: An installed anima barkskin.

HediffDef.label: anima liver
HediffDef.description: An installed anima liver.

HediffDef.label: anima kidney
HediffDef.description: An installed anima kidney.

HediffDef.label: anima polux lung
HediffDef.description: An installed anima polux lung.

HediffDef.label: anima eye
HediffDef.description: An installed anima eye.

HediffDef.label: anima stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed anima stomach.

HediffDef.label: anima spine
HediffDef.description: An installed anima spine.

HediffDef.label: anima heart
HediffDef.description: An installed anima heart.

HediffDef.label: tribal eyepatch
HediffDef.description: A primitive eyepatch covering the missing eye.

HediffDef.label: eyepatch
HediffDef.description: An eyepatch covering the missing eye.

HediffDef.label: glass eye
HediffDef.description: An installed glass eye.

HediffDef.label: light receptor
HediffDef.description: An installed light receptor.

HediffDef.label: royal bionic eye
HediffDef.description: An installed royal bionic eye.

HediffDef.label: Gorilla Arm
HediffDef.description: An installed Gorilla Arm. Gorilla Arms, like most late generation cyberware, feature real-time 1:1 synaptic junctions that operate as fast as the user can think. Rather than mechanical actuators, their strength now comes from synthetic muscles made of electric-field activated shape-memory alloys that easily fit within the normal profile of your arm. Apply a layer of Realskinn on top, and no one needs to know you can rip open closed doors like they are made out of paper; though if you want, bright colors and trademark patterns can advertise what you're packing.

HediffDef.label: Mantis Blade
HediffDef.description: An installed Mantis Blade. Arm blades designed with lethality and concealment in mind. As effective as they are flashy.

HediffDef.label: Higurashi 20-13 Mantis Blade
HediffDef.description: An installed Higurashi 20-13 Mantis Blade. An older iteration of the Mantis Blade arm cyberware, they are considered to be of very high quality but suffer from a dangerous flaw - poor interface with neural processors and the prefrontal cortex, which results in users frequently developing cyberpsychosis.

HediffDef.label: Projectile Launch System
HediffDef.description: An installed Projectile Launch System. A missile launcher in the palm of your hand (more or less literally).

HediffDef.label: biomonitor
HediffDef.description: An installed biomonitor. Reads user's vitals and automatically dispenses remedies to maintain homeostasis. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: microrotors
HediffDef.description: A set of installed microrotors. Improves melee attack speed. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: clutch padding
HediffDef.description: An installed clutch padding implant. Increases rate of ranged attacks. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: blood pump
HediffDef.description: An installed blood pump. Provides a secondary source of blood to keep the user alive and accelerates oxygen supply to the body's cells. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Kiroshi "Stalker" optics
HediffDef.description: An installed Kiroshi "Stalker" eye. High-quality cyberoptic implant with advanced multi-spectral scanning and targeting modes and specialized datalink processors for ranged combat. This allows the user to accurately approximate target positions in complete darkness or even behind cover.

HediffDef.label: Kiroshi "Doomsayer" optics
HediffDef.description: An installed Kiroshi "Doomsayer" eye. High-quality cyberoptic implant with advanced wide-angle scanning and threat detection modes, and specialized datalink processors for melee combat. This allows the user to respond swiftly to close-range threats, even in complete darkness.

HediffDef.label: Kiroshi "The Oracle" optics
HediffDef.description: An installed Kiroshi "The Oracle" eye. Iconic cyberoptic implant with advanced wide-angle multi-spectral scanning, targeting and threat detection modes and dual-mode datalink processors for ranged and melee combat. This allows the user to accurately approximate target positions in complete darkness or even behind cover, and also respond swiftly to close-range threats.

HediffDef.label: memory boost
HediffDef.description: An installed memory boost implant. An implant that increases the brain's capacity to store and process information. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Ex-Disk
HediffDef.description: An installed Ex-Disk. A module that optimizes the sync between brain and cyberware. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Kerenzikov Boost System
HediffDef.description: An installed Kerenzikov Boost System. Improves Kerenzikov by enhancing the user's speed and reflexes.

HediffDef.label: shock absorbers
HediffDef.description: An installed pair of shock absorbers. These reduce recoil and improve weapon handling. They also make the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: ballistic coprocessor
HediffDef.description: An installed ballistic coprocessor. Increases accuracy and acquisition speed.

HediffDef.label: Handle Wrap
HediffDef.description: An installed Handle Wrap implant. Increases melee hit and crit chance.

HediffDef.label: Immovable Force
HediffDef.description: An installed Immovable Force implant. Improved Iconic variant of the shock absorbers. These decrease recoil massively, to the point of allowing the user to fire significantly faster than normal. They also make the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active optical camo
HediffDef.description: Optically-induced invisibility. Makes the user impossible to locate in visible spectrum light.

HediffDef.label: optical camo
HediffDef.description: An installed optical camo system. Makes the user impossible to locate in visible spectrum light. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: subdermal armor
HediffDef.description: An installed layer of subdermal armor. Simple, but effective.

HediffDef.label: Proxishield
HediffDef.description: An installed Proxishield. Increases defense against melee threats. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Pain Editor
HediffDef.description: An installed Pain Editor. Reduces pain, slightly reduces damage taken. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Chitin
HediffDef.description: An installed Chitin subdermal protection system. Thick plates of overlapping armor laid under the skin provide solid protection against most threats. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: fortified ankles
HediffDef.description: An installed pair of fortified ankles. Ankle joints reinforced with plastic fibers and nanogel-filled joint capsules, allowing the user to channel more power from their legs and perform charged jumps.

HediffDef.label: Leeroy Ligament System
HediffDef.description: An installed Leeroy Ligament System. Increases movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Jenkins' Tendons
HediffDef.description: An installed Jenkins' Tendons implant. Increases movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Kerenzikov
HediffDef.description: An installed Kerenzikov. Passively increases perception during critical moments. Results vary depending on the circumstances and are difficult to quantify. On average, the user gains roughly 14% more time to process and act. The increased processing does take a small toll on the user, forcing them to rest slightly more often. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Neofiber
HediffDef.description: An installed Neofiber synthetic muscle replacement. Adaptive hardening capability allows the user to cushion impacts and reduce penetration from projectiles that may otherwise bypass the outer armor layers. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Stabber
HediffDef.description: An installed Stabber implant. Improved reflex suite improves user's performance in melee combat. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: visual cortex support system
HediffDef.description: An installed visual cortex support system. Provides a secondary visual processing center, allowing the user to more quickly spot targets and weak points. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: cyberware malfunction
HediffDef.description: Cyberware malfunction caused by an EMP attack. Motor functions are impaired, and incoming damage is slightly amplified.

HediffDef.label: chrome compressor
HediffDef.description: An installed chrome compressor. Lowers risk of psychosis at the cost of taking up the OS slot, and is incompatible with sandevistan, berserk and cyberdeck implants.

HediffDef.label: bionic joints
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic joint system. Increases carrying capacity.

HediffDef.label: titanium bones
HediffDef.description: An installed titanium skeleton. Increases armor. Simple, but effective.

HediffDef.label: dense marrow
HediffDef.description: An installed dense marrow implant. Increases melee damage at the cost of attack speed. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Rara Avis
HediffDef.description: An installed Rara Avis skeletal armor mounting system. Provides an improved foundation for new and existing armor implants, dramatically boosting their effectiveness. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: the Relic 3.0
HediffDef.description: The Relic 3.0. The nanites within this unit surround and interface directly with the brain and allow the host to better tolerate an increased amount of cyberware. The onboard AI engram has also been tailored specifically towards providing therapeutic guidance and moral support for the host without interfering with daily activities, drastically suppressing psychotic tendencies. This comes at the cost of making the host almost totally psychically deaf as the nanites also act as a Faraday cage around the brain, shielding it from direct electromagnetic signals. The Relic itself still remains vulnerable to EMP attacks which will cause it to malfunction and disrupt the neural pathways, causing pain and impairing motor function. Once activated, the Relic cannot be removed.

HediffDef.label: Relic malfunction
HediffDef.description: Relic malfunction caused by an EMP attack. Very painful. The host's motor functions are severely impaired, and incoming damage is amplified significantly.

HediffDef.label: cyberware malfunction
HediffDef.description: Cyberdeck malfunction caused by an EMP attack. The deck's neural interface circuits are overloaded, causing intense pain, and incoming damage is significantly amplified.

HediffDef.label: Arasaka Shadow cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Arasaka Shadow cyberdeck. Specialized for stealth operations, able to turn enemies against each other or knock them flat out. Installed quickhacks: Short Circuit, Bait, Memory Wipe (2 charges), Sonic Shock, Cyberpsychosis (2 charges), System Collapse This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Militech Paraline cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Militech Paraline cyberdeck. A military-grade deck focused on suppression and force escalation. Excels at disabling and destabilizing high-priority targets. Installed quickhacks: Overheat, Short Circuit, Contagion, Synapse Burnout, Cripple Movement, Weapon Glitch, Sonic Shock, Detonate Grenade This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Biotech Sigma cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Biotech Sigma cyberdeck. A compact and stable cyberdeck favored by entry-level netrunners. Optimized for quick cooldowns and minimal RAM usage, but lacking raw power. Installed quickhacks: Overheat, Short Circuit, Contagion, Synapse Burnout, Reboot Optics, Cripple Movement, Weapon Glitch, Detonate Grenade This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Raven Microcyber cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Raven Microcyber cyberdeck. A lightweight, affordable cyberdeck built for reliability and speed over potency. Well-suited to crowd control and supporting hacks. Installed quickhacks: Overheat, Short Circuit, Contagion (2 charges), Cripple Movement, Weapon Glitch, Request Backup, Sonic Shock This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Tetratronic Rippler cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Tetratronic Rippler cyberdeck. Designed for combat netrunners, the Rippler emphasizes raw power and crowd control. Well-suited for chaotic battlefield manipulation. Installed quickhacks: Overheat, Short Circuit, Reboot Optics, Weapon Glitch, Cyberpsychosis, Suicide, Detonate Grenade (2 charges) This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Netwatch Netdriver cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Netwatch Netdriver cyberdeck. A true "jack of all trades", the Netdriver features extremely quick RAM recovery and emphasizes enhanced system control with stealth and utility hacks while also analyzing targets for vulnerabilities. Installed quickhacks: Overheat, Short Circuit, Contagion, Synapse Burnout, Bait, Memory Wipe, Sonic Shock, System Collapse This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: Militech Canto cyberdeck
HediffDef.description: An installed Militech Canto cyberdeck. The bleeding edge of cyberdeck evolution, the Canto Mk.6 taps into forbidden Blackwall routines. Power comes at a cost The AI engram contained within may occasionally intrude into the host's mind, causing them to behave erratically or even go berserk. Use with caution. Installed quickhacks: Short Circuit, Request Backup, Blackwall Gateway (2 charges) Unlike other cyberdecks, this one is not susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active berserk
HediffDef.description: An active Militech berserk. User is invulnerable to physical damage, deals more damage and moves faster.

HediffDef.label: Militech berserk
HediffDef.description: An installed Militech berserk. The only official berserk implant from Militech available on the market, but an exceptionally fine one at that. Its genius lies in being nanopowered, making it highly suited for regenerative purposes. When active, it puts the user into a primal rage state and renders them invulnerable to physical damage while increasing their own speed and damage dealt, at the cost of forgetting how to handle ranged weapons. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active berserk
HediffDef.description: An active Zetatech berserk. User is highly resistant to physical damage and attacks faster.

HediffDef.label: Zetatech berserk
HediffDef.description: An installed Zetatech berserk. Thanks to its revolutionary nanodermal impact-absorption systems, Zetatech's berserk implant is designed to make its users into lean, mean killing machines that are also hard to kill, themselves. Also features enhanced jump reflexes. When active, it puts the user into a primal rage state and renders them highly resistant to physical damage while increasing their own attack speed, at the cost of forgetting how to handle ranged weapons. Like all OS cyberware, this makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active berserk
HediffDef.description: An active BioDyne berserk. User is highly resistant to physical damage, attacks faster and hits harder.

HediffDef.label: BioDyne berserk
HediffDef.description: An installed BioDyne berserk. The berserk model from BioDyne is an affordable and versatile implant for those who want quick and easy results, but don't expect miracles. It does what it says on the box. When active, it puts the user into a primal rage state and renders them highly resistant to physical damage while increasing their own attack speed and damage, at the cost of forgetting how to handle ranged weapons. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active berserk
HediffDef.description: An active Moore Tech berserk. User is highly resistant to physical damage.

HediffDef.label: Moore Tech berserk
HediffDef.description: An installed Moore Tech berserk. A classic implant, one of the more popular "Berserk" model made by Moore Technologies. Tested and proven in high-stakes combat. When active, it puts the user into a primal rage state and renders them highly resistant to physical damage at the cost of forgetting how to handle ranged weapons. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: cyberware malfunction
HediffDef.description: Sandevistan malfunction caused by an EMP attack. Motor functions are impaired, and incoming damage is amplified.

HediffDef.label: active sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An active Militech "Apogee" sandevistan. User's perception, reaction time and speed are boosted to unbelievable levels.

HediffDef.label: Militech "Apogee" sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An installed Militech "Apogee" sandevistan. The pinnacle of perception and reaction time enhancement. When active, time appears to be slowed down by 85% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they move fast enough to disappear. This type of boost is very taxing to the user's mind and body, forcing them to eat and rest more often the more they use it. This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs while active. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis. *Note: This implant's ability has a very short duration, and may not be useful with automatic weapons.

HediffDef.label: active sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An active Militech "Falcon" sandevistan. User's perception, reaction time and speed are boosted to astonishing levels.

HediffDef.label: Militech "Falcon" sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An installed Militech "Falcon" sandevistan. Military-grade perception and reaction time enhancement. When active, time appears to be slowed down by 70% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move at astonishing speed. This type of boost is very taxing to the user's mind and body, forcing them to eat and rest more often the more they use it. This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs while active. It also makes the user *much* more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An active QianT "Warp Dancer" sandevistan. User's defense, perception, reaction time and speed are boosted significantly.

HediffDef.label: QianT "Warp Dancer" sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An installed QianT "Warp Dancer" sandevistan. This unique unit is more focused on defense rather than offense. When active, time appears to be slowed down by 20% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move significantly faster. This type of boost is very taxing to the user's mind and body, forcing them to eat and rest more often the more they use it. This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs while active. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An active Dynalar sandevistan. User's perception, reaction time and speed are boosted to incredible levels.

HediffDef.label: Dynalar sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An installed Dynalar sandevistan. Civilian-grade perception and reaction time enhancement. When active, time appears to be slowed down by 50% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move at incredible speed. This type of boost is very taxing to the user's mind and body, forcing them to eat and rest more often the more they use it. This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs while active. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: active sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An active Zetatech sandevistan. User's perception, reaction time and speed are boosted to great levels.

HediffDef.label: Zetatech sandevistan
HediffDef.description: An installed Zetatech sandevistan. Civilian-grade perception and reaction time enhancement with enhanced jump reflexes. When active, time appears to be slowed down by 30% for the user, while they are not slowed. From an outside perspective, they appear to move at great speed. This type of boost is very taxing to the user's mind and body, forcing them to eat and rest more often the more they use it. This makes the user susceptible to cyberware malfunction from EMPs while active. It also makes the user more prone to psychosis.

HediffDef.label: blackwall corruption
HediffDef.description: Nervous system has been overwhelmed by a Blackwall archotech, causing debilitating pain.

HediffDef.label: system collapse
HediffDef.description: After-effects of a total nervous system collapse.

HediffDef.label: suicidal compulsion
HediffDef.description: Suicidal compulsion caused by a quickhack. The victim - fully conscious, aware and completely unwilling - has their motor system remotely taken over by a hacker. They are compelled to stick some iron in their mouth and pull the trigger.

HediffDef.label: sonic shock
HediffDef.description: A feedback loop in the victim's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Pain is amplified in this state.

HediffDef.label: sonic shock
HediffDef.description: A feedback loop in the victim's sensory processors. Extremely distracting. Pain is amplified in this state. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: cognitive invisibility
HediffDef.description: Quickhack-induced invisibility. Nearby enemies are forced to "forget" this person's presence, rendering them functionally invisible.

HediffDef.label: weapon glitch
HediffDef.description: A temporary weapon malfunction caused by a quickhack, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire.

HediffDef.label: weapon glitch
HediffDef.description: A temporary weapon malfunction caused by a quickhack, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: weapon glitch
HediffDef.description: A temporary weapon malfunction caused by a quickhack, dramatically reducing accuracy and rate of fire. Rippler variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: crippled movement
HediffDef.description: A temporary leg malfunction caused by a quickhack, inhibiting movement.

HediffDef.label: crippled movement
HediffDef.description: A temporary leg malfunction caused by a quickhack, inhibiting movement. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: cyberware malfunction
HediffDef.description: Cyberware malfunction caused by a quickhack. Motor functions are impaired, and incoming damage is slightly amplified.

HediffDef.label: cyberware malfunction
HediffDef.description: Cyberware malfunction caused by a quickhack. Motor functions are impaired, and incoming damage is slightly amplified. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: optics rebooting
HediffDef.description: A forced optical reboot caused by a quickhack, causing temporary blindness.

HediffDef.label: optics rebooting
HediffDef.description: A forced optical reboot caused by a quickhack, causing temporary blindness. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: optics rebooting
HediffDef.description: A forced optical reboot caused by a quickhack, causing temporary blindness. Rippler variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: synapse burnout
HediffDef.description: Synapses have been overloaded with pain signals.

HediffDef.label: synapse burnout
HediffDef.description: Synapses have been overloaded with pain signals. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: synapse burnout
HediffDef.description: Synapses have been overloaded with pain signals. Sigma variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: synapse burnout
HediffDef.description: Synapses have been overloaded with pain signals. Netdriver variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: contagion
HediffDef.description: Quickhack-induced poisoning, causing loss of spatial orientation and vomiting.

HediffDef.label: contagion
HediffDef.description: Quickhack-induced poisoning, causing loss of spatial orientation and vomiting. Paraline variant, increases victim's physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: contagion
HediffDef.description: Quickhack-induced poisoning, causing loss of spatial orientation and vomiting. Sigma variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: contagion
HediffDef.description: Quickhack-induced poisoning, causing loss of spatial orientation and vomiting. Netdriver variant, reveals a major physical vulnerability.

HediffDef.label: discovered vulnerability
HediffDef.description: A Militech quickhack has revealed a vulnerability in the victim's physical defenses.

HediffDef.label: discovered vulnerability
HediffDef.description: A Biotech quickhack has revealed a major vulnerability in the victim's physical defenses.

HediffDef.label: discovered vulnerability
HediffDef.description: A Netwatch quickhack has revealed a vulnerability in the victim's physical defenses.

HediffDef.label: neurostimulator
HediffDef.description: An installed neurostimulator.

HediffDef.label: hyporegulator
HediffDef.description: An installed hyporegulator.

HediffDef.label: cortexaugmentor
HediffDef.description: An installed cortexaugmentor.

HediffDef.label: synthetic lung
HediffDef.description: An installed synthetic lung.

HediffDef.label: synthetic liver
HediffDef.description: An installed synthetic liver.

HediffDef.label: synthetic kidney
HediffDef.description: An installed synthetic kidney.

HediffDef.label: synthetic heart
HediffDef.description: An installed synthetic heart.

HediffDef.label: synthetic stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed synthetic stomach.

HediffDef.label: wooden foot
HediffDef.description: An installed wooden foot.

HediffDef.label: cochlear implant
HediffDef.description: An installed cochlear implant

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic leg
HediffDef.description: An installed prosthetic leg

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic arm
HediffDef.description: An installed prosthetic arm

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic hand
HediffDef.description: An installed prosthetic hand

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic foot
HediffDef.description: An installed prosthetic foot

HediffDef.label: spinal fusion
HediffDef.description: A fused spine

HediffDef.label: artificial nose
HediffDef.description: An installed artifical nose

HediffDef.label: artificial humerus
HediffDef.description: An installed artificial humerus

HediffDef.label: artificial radius
HediffDef.description: An installed artificial radius

HediffDef.label: artificial tibia
HediffDef.description: An installed artificial tibia

HediffDef.label: artificial femur
HediffDef.description: An installed artificial femur

HediffDef.label: stomach transplant
HediffDef.description: A transplanted stomach.

HediffDef.label: heart transplant
HediffDef.description: A transplanted heart.

HediffDef.label: liver transplant
HediffDef.description: A transplanted liver.

HediffDef.label: kidney transplant
HediffDef.description: A transplanted kidney.

HediffDef.label: lung transplant
HediffDef.description: A transplanted lung.

HediffDef.label: power arm
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic power arm.

HediffDef.label: bionic hand
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic hand.

HediffDef.label: bionic foot
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic foot.

HediffDef.label: bionic jaw
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic jaw

HediffDef.label: bionic tongue
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic tongue

HediffDef.label: bionic ear
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic ear.

HediffDef.label: bionic eye
HediffDef.description: An installed bionic eye.
